    • Constructor Detail

      • Character

        public Character(java.awt.Color color,
                 int x,
                 int y,
                 int w,
                 int h,
                 int facing)
        Constructs an object of the Character class, using Sprite's super constructor
        Parameters:
        color: - The color of the drawn character
        x: - The x value of the character
        y: - The y value of the character
        w: - The width of the character
        h: - The height of the character
        facing: - Which way the character is facing

    • Method Detail

      • getBlockHeight

        public BlockHeight getBlockHeight()

      • setBlocking

        public void setBlocking(BlockHeight blocking)

      • isAttackHit

        public boolean isAttackHit()

      • getProjectiles

        public java.util.ArrayList<Projectile> getProjectiles()

      • updateCrouching

        public void updateCrouching()
        Changes the height and y position of the character based on whether they were crouching or not.

      • act

        public void act()
        This is the method that advances the game. Moves the characters based on the X and Y velocity and checks and sets state and Hitboxes.

      • addHitbox

        protected void addHitbox(int xOffset,
                         int yOffset,
                         int width,
                         int height,
                         int startup,
                         int active,
                         int recovery,
                         int hitstun,
                         int blockstun,
                         double xKB,
                         double yKB,
                         BlockHeight blockHeight,
                         boolean ko)
        Adds a hitbox to the ArrayList of hitboxes attributed to this Character.
        Parameters:
        xOffset: - The x at which the hitbox should be generated relative to the character
        yOffset: - The y at which the hitbox should be generated relative to the character
        width: - The width of the hitbox
        height: - The height of the hitbox
        startup: - How long the hitbox takes to become active
        active: - How long the hitbox remains active
        recovery: - How long the Character cannot move after the hitbox has stopped being active
        hitstun: - How long the opposing Character cannot move after struck by the hitbox
        blockstun: - How long the opposing Character cannot move after being struck by the hitbox while blocking
        xKB: - Horizontal movement of the opposing Character after struck by the hitbox
        yKB: - Vertical movement of the opposing Character after struck by the hitbox
        blockHeight: - What height the opposing Character must block at to block this attack
        ko: - Whether the move knocks out in the corner

      • addProjectile

                             int xOffset,

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet g)
        Draws the next frame of the game. Calls Sprite's version of draw.
        Overrides:
        draw in class Sprite
        Parameters:
        g: - The PApplet on which the game is drawn.

      • changeState

        public void changeState(boolean input)
        Changes the state of the character between CONTROLLABLE or NOT.
        Parameters:
        input: - true if the character should not be controllable, false if they should be controllable

      • hitboxesIntersect

        public Hitbox hitboxesIntersect(java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Float rect)
        Checks whether any of the hitboxes produced by this character touches the other character.
        Parameters:
        rect: - The Rectangle2D.Double that represents the other character.
        Returns:
        A hitbox that is touching the other character.

      • projectilesIntersect

        public Projectile projectilesIntersect(java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Float rect)
        Checks if the Projectiles produced by this character intersects with a Rectangle2D.Float
        Parameters:
        rect: - The Rectangle2D.Float checked for intersection
        Returns:
        The Projectile if it makes contact with the Rectangle2D.Float

      • takeHit

        public boolean takeHit(int hitstun,
                       double xKB,
                       double yKB,
                       boolean ko)
        Called when a hitbox intersects this character, inflicts hitstun and knockback based on the attack the opponent has hit with.
        Parameters:
        hitstun: - Hitstun inflicted by the opposing attack.
        xKB: - Horizontal knockback inflicted by the opposing attack.
        yKB: - Vertical knockback inflicted by the opposing attack.
        ko: - Whether the move this Character is being hit by knocks out in the corner
        Returns:
        Whether the character has been knocked out

      • blockHit

        public void blockHit(int hitstun,
                     double xKB)
        Called when a hitbox intersects this character while it is blocking, inflicts hitstun and knockback based on the attack the opponent has hit with.
        Parameters:
        hitstun: - Hitstun inflicted by the opposing attack on block.
        xKB: - Horizontal knockback inflicted by the opposing attack normally.

      • updateHitboxes

        protected void updateHitboxes()
        Updates what hitboxes are on screen and which phase they are in(startup, active, recovery)

      • walk

        public void walk(int dir)
        If on the ground, causes the character to move left or right.
        Parameters:
        dir: - Input value of -1 or 1, determines whether character walks left or right.
